delivery_content_info.description: <llm-instruction>This part of the input schema is truncated. If you want to pass the property `delivery_content_info` to the tool, first call the tool `expandSchema` with "/properties/delivery_play_config/properties/delivery_full_send_config/properties/delivery_content_info" in the list of pointers. delivery_floor_amount.description: 满足消费金额门槛，左闭区间，单位元。	说明：限制支付时的订单金额最少满足的金额门槛。	限制：value > 0 && value <= 99999。
